title: Zee News
summary: Zee News is an Indian Hindi-language news channel owned by the Essel Group.[1]  Zee News was launched on 27 August 1999, The Zee News channel is the flagship channel of Zee Media Corporation Ltd.[2] The channel has been involved in several controversies and has broadcast fabricated news stories on multiple occasions.[3] The channel is subjected to an ongoing criminal defamation case against legislator Mahua Moitra as of March 2020.[4]
